hours_text:
Learn the art of burlesque! 

_**The Burlesque Hall of Fame’s School of Striptease offers burlesque classes for the hobbyist, the novice, and established performers of all levels. Our classes are guided by the principle that “All bodies are burlesque bodies”, with a commitment to the comfort and empowerment of our students. Furthermore, we welcome all ages (over 18), ethnicities, body types, levels of physical ability, and levels of personal comfort. Learn the art of burlesque from the industry’s top performers of today and yesteryear**_!

> “The largest benefit by far is my increased self esteem. These classes have created a new way of seeing myself. Yes, I learned moves and routines but I really learned to be beautiful in my own skin!”
> 
> Darling Dena, Student

> “The teachers are fantastic, and I’ve had wonderful classmates every time!”
> 
> Rumor Reign, Student

> “Thorough, fun, engaging, encouraging, excellent teachers…Would take again, just for the experience and fun of it.”
> 
> Bella Brava, Student

##### 2026 Schedule

## Burlesque Classes

Burlesque for Beginners is perfect for new beginnings! Start the new year finding joy and community with the School of Striptease!

The School of Striptease has been welcoming new students since 2019 and here’s what our students have to say!

> _“Full tilt, everything in one class! Thorough, fun, engaging, encouraging, excellent teachers_.”

Check out what’s on at BHoF! From film screenings and lectures to workshops and classes for all levels, there’s always a fun new way to learn.
